name: Noel Alvarez
text:
Nothing but good things to say about this spot.

A+ service from the entire staff. Everyone was attentive. I never needed to ask ‚Ä¶More

name: John Bruno
text: Gluten free dough. Wholesome ingredients. Great food at a great price. Super cool comic book themed decor. I love the environmental friendly table waste products such as paper straws, recycled paper napkins, etc....every restaurant needs to follow their suite.

name: Ann Marie Teets
text: We ordered a cheese pizza tonight and there was barely any cheese on it and it tasted bad. Additionally, I ordered a Greek salad and I was delivered a container of lettuce with no toppings. So disappointing.

name: Darlene FlyGirl
text: Food was awesome! Thin crust and the service was awesome! Such nice young people. The artwork of Hulk outside really cool. My son turned 21 & we went for nostalgia.

name: Lucky Lucy1205
text: Once I get use to South Gerogia pizza versus Chicago I will rate MM higher.  Help was pleasant.

name: Kevin Jennings Jr
text: Delicious, delicious, delicious!!!  My wife, my coworker, his wife, and I ate here 5 times while we did a job in Valdosta, GA.  Everytime the food was absolutely fantastic and the prices were beyond reasonable.  The restaurant theme, decor, and food made it one of my top 10 favorite restaurants I have ever been to!

name: DallasPilotCar
text: Hip place i guess. They take your temperature at the door, but i did not have to wear my mask in at least.  I ordered the small Shitake Mushroom pizza.. I do not recall there being very many mushrooms but, what i do recall is some sort of ‚Ä¶More

name: Jenova Strife
text: The food was wonderful and didnt take too long. The atmosphere was lovely and the service was so good. And their gluten free pizza is so good!

name: Marco Montero
text: Very very good environment. Friendly server and the food was absolutely delicious. Would recommend to anyone with taste buds.

name: Jim Malin
text: Great bartender, great red wine. I really enjoyed my evening.

name: Cynthia Sadler
text: Delicious food, special orders, no problem. Good hygiene practices.

name: Justin Hill
text: Zy is the man, went out of his way to make my experience great. Good people take a business and make it feel like a partnership.

name: Jade The Cookie
text: Love their pizza.i liked when we walked in they told us they were understaffed so it would be a longer wait. The pizza was so tasty.üòãüçïüçïüòãüçïüòãüçïüòãüçïüòãüçïüòãüçïüòãüçïüòãüçï

name: Freddy Wolf
text: The food was real good, fresh, and tasty. Service left something to be desired, we sat at our table and never got helped, the servers just stood at the counter looking at us. We finally moved to the bar, and got service. When we got it, ‚Ä¶More

name: Daisy Vickers
text: Awesome pizzas......get to order your choice...

name: Silvia S.
text: Delicious üëèüëèüëè! My boyfriend wanted pizza but I cannot eat marinara sauce because of medical reasons, I was so relieved they did have a pizza I could enjoy! I got The Marley (a pesto base pizza) with caramelized onions and it was soooo good! Highly Recommend üòÄ!

name: The Sunny Side of Coffee
text: First time trying Mellow Mushroom and I like it.  Server was friendly and they have some $1 items on their happy hour.

name: Andrea Heflin
text: Great service when we first arrived. I'm guessing they did a shift change while we was there and the shift that came in after checked on the other customers 4 times without checking on us once. We had to ask for refills, box and the ticket.

name: Bernard Hickman
text: One of the best burgers in town.

name: Miranda Lipinski
text: Very poor customer service. Came in around 9:30 when Google says they close at 11. Seemed so rushed like they were waiting on us to leave. Food was ok.. other workers were standing on the side complaining about another customer.. very unprofessional.

name: Martha Ritchey
text: Probably would have been better if out food would have arrived in a timely manor and didn't become free food because our ticket got lost. And one of the hosts sweeping the floor sure was missing a bunch. Table next to us walked out after ‚Ä¶More

name: Amanda Swann
text: The waiters and everyone was very pleasant

name: Big Lev
text: Food was really good. Server was very attentive. Food took forever to come out.

name: Charles Parkman
text: First time trying their vegan pizza. It was very good. I believe they use Daiya cheese which isn't my favorite but tasted very good with the veggies, olive oil, sauce and garlic I had on my pizza. I also had the hummus appetizer which ‚Ä¶More

name: Iris
text: I'm so happy to find out they have vegan cheese! I haven't had pizza in 8/9 months because of dairy problems. Thank you mellow. Sorry I ate half the pizza before I took this photo üòÇ

name: Mahomri Palacios
text: Love the atmosphere. Pizza is good. Staff was very nice and attentive.

name: Patience Armbruster
text: Food was ok. Service needed help. Our waitress acted like she had to pee the whole time. Couldn't stand still. Messed up our order.

name: Andru Jones
text: The pizza/food here is second to none! I was referred to Mellow Mushroom by a friend and happened to drive by it looking for another restaurant. I decided to stop there instead. I am glad that I did! The steak and cheese calzone was delicious.

name: kacey creech
text: For some reason, for the last three years, EVERYTIME I have visited this place the service is ...'off'. The food is always as good as other mellow mushrooms but something always seems to go wrong or is extremely slow.

name: Mr A
text: Food was great and atmosphere as well.

name: juan torres
text: Best pizza in Valdosta in my opinion.

name: dean galusha
text: Best pizza in the area

name: Steven Powers
text: Service was great, Food was fantastic, I love  Mellow Mushroom. Second Mellow Mushroom I've been to and by decor definitely not the same restaurant. Love the super heros.. Tampa you have a run for best decor.

name: Richard Cook
text: Great food and great service!

name: Turn A Page
text: Great veggie pizza

name: Bryson Williams
text:
Not really much to say other than it was a pleasant experience to dine here.

Pricing is a little on the high side for pizza, but it's a nice place to enjoy a quality pizza once in awhile.

name: Lesley Brinkman-Mosiman
text: Ordered 30 min ahead then dined in.  Still took another 15 minutes but pizza was well worth the wait!  Ordered the great white pizza. Body of pizza is thin with a nice crispy thicker ridge around the edge.  My husband had a pepperoni, ‚Ä¶More

name: Andrew Meier
text: The food is good, the paper straws however suck.

name: Robert Gingras
text: Service was great.  PIE WAS A LITTLE UNDER COOKED.  BUT SAUCE WAS VERY TADYY.  WILL COME BACK.

name: Ryan Carroll
text: Awesome staff.   Great food.  Love the new location!    I'll definitely be visiting this location more frequently!

name: Jean K
text:
July 2017:Great pizza...we had the pepperoni and green pepper. Tasty sauce and the crust is very good also. Definitely a good place for pizza.
October 2017: ‚Ä¶More

name: PB
text: The theme was AMAZING! As for me, I'm a long times Mellow Mushroom fan, so when we saw the restaurant,  we freaked out and yeeted inside. The place is clean, and the waiter's and waitresses were nice! Food was great! Loved it! Thank you!~

name: Amanda
text: Love the interesting pizza here. I'll definitely be trying it again!

name: Kelly Brady
text: I love the customer service. Hakeem the server was very pleasant and attentive.  The food presentation was excellent.

name: Dave McKeller
text: They are great service and pizza. Best pizza place in the town for vegetarian.

name: Adedamola ADEOGUN
text: I was there the eve of Halloween with my friend and his wife. Some people were dressed in their Halloween costumes. Nice place, though it was my first time. The pizza was good, very good.

name: Ivy Lopez
text: Totally organized, nice service, courteous, delicious food.

name: Tramaine Marie
text: Great pizzas! Always hot and fresh

name: Joshua Messing
text: Without question the best Italian food I've ever had, everything is and or taste homemade from the marinara sauce to the cheese dip. The people were so friendly, probably one of the best dining experiences I've ever had you guys are awesome. Thank you to Sarah for the awesome arnold Palmer (Like if this helpedüëç)

name: Scott Missildine
text: Wow, cant find a NASCAR race on tv. Great food...service a bit inattentive.

name: Tony G
text: Who was pretty fast drinks were great and excellent service.

name: Steve
text: The Valdosta place is not the Mellow Mushroom. Due to too many old people with influence they should not have,  it's nothing special now. Go to Columbus Georgia,  that's the Mellow Mushroom.

name: Suzi Mancil
text: The staff is great but it took 2 hours to get our food and the manager came out to ask how different tables were doing but snubbed ours.  Then she went back and hid while the staff worked as hard as they could on backed up orders.  Our waiter was very nice and professional.

name: Kelly Matonti
text: What! Awesomeness

name: John Renn
text: Great food, the pizza was awesome. Service was great.

name: Peyton Wade
text: Fantastic food, super chill and friendly staff. Overall wonderful experience everytime.

name: Tiffany Roberts
text: Great customer service , clean facility an great food.

name: chuck rasmussen
text: Great food,beer and service!!! Definitely family friendly üòÅ

name: Jeffrey Joyner
text: The pizza was good! However, the pretzel bites are only cut up breadsticks with sprinkled parmesan cheese on them. Where's the sprinkled sea salt that makes the difference between pretzels and breadsticks? Lastly, their drinks are TOO ‚Ä¶More

name: Kim Redding
text: This place yes yes yes food is so so good the chef salad is out of this world. I'm not a pizza eater and this is the only place I will eat it.

name: Helga Kulkarni
text:
We stopped in for a quick late lunch on our trip from Florida to north Georgia. My son and I are vegan and we knew they served vegan cheese.
Once seated,  it took almost 1/2 hour to be served water and have our orders ‚Ä¶More

text: Excellent service. Pretzels are the best anywhere

name: Lorraine Pope
text: Great food and prices, but the service was a little slow.

name: Mel White-Hatcher
text: Was told rhis was the best pizza place in town by our hotel so have it a try. Wait was 30 minutes. No big deal it was a Friday night. Get seated the server doesn't know any od the answers about the menu that was ask. Was told our dinner ‚Ä¶More

name: Panjabi Ink
text: We had to wait 15 minutes and then actually go to the front to get a server to at least come over and get us drinks and take our order.  We asked for a high chair but never got it.  Overall! Restaurant ambience was nice, lots of kids ‚Ä¶More

name: Mary Folsom
text: It has the best pizza and the best hoegie's

name: Sapphire Flame
text: Quick and friendly service.  It's always nice and cool in this restaurant which makes visiting a pleasure during the hot summer months.  The food is always consistently good. It's a must stop on our way through Valdosta.

name: Cyndi Harrell
text: Did you know that Mellow Mushroom caters weddings? Mellow Mushroom of Valdosta recently catered my daughter‚Äôs wedding and it was a HUGE hit with the guests! Manager Lindsey and her staff went above and beyond to help us create a memorable reception!

name: E. Ila Brown Pianelli
text: Great food and drinks but the service could be improved.

name: Michael Pitsakis
text: Surprisingly nice pizza restaurant in Valdosta. Calzone was really tasty and service was great.

name: Dawn Boyajian
text: Great happy hour drink & appetizer specials which include their wonderful craft beer selection. Recommend sitting at their well laid out bar, the bartenders are very helpful & attentive. Or sit outside under their sculptures made entirely ‚Ä¶More

name: James Kent
text: Quick accurate service, friendly staff. GREAT beer selction. Pizza was pretty good, but nothing to rave about.

name: Noah M
text: Came with my girlfriend at the same time a large group of ~12 people were there, and it took around 45 minutes to get our 2 small pizzas because the entire kitchen was focused on the large group. Seemed very inefficient as there were about ‚Ä¶More

name: Candas Bennett
text: Food was a little slow getting out, once ordered. But was good!! And service was great, she had a wonderful personality

name: Heather Day
text: Very long wait time for food (1hr) since hardly any customers there. Need more staff especially on a Friday night when we were there.The food was good.

name: Brite Designs Studio
text: Great prices on pizzas that come out hot and freshly made. Great service all around, and the atmosphere is fun!

name: David Barringer
text: As if it needs to be said, their products are delicious. The server was fast and polite and very engaging. The atmosphere is enjoyable...

name: Mandie Ortiz
text: Great place to eat when they can actually get the order right. Usually only happens one out of five visits. Also, the consistency of the taste and texture of certain items differ depending on who is cooking. This will be the last time I eat here, the hassle is not worth it.

name: Millie Vu
text: 20$ for a bad hamburger and tat or tots. They use to be ok. But don‚Äôt know what happened will never go there again.

text: Great atmosphere, good food, appreciate the eco friendly choices and the staff going the extra mile to please you!

name: John
text: Food good as always.  Bartender was fun.

name: Chris Copeland
text: Great service and food. Very unique design with the superhero theme. Family friendly environment.

name: Karen Connelly
text: Comfortable place, friendly staff, fabulous pizza! Will definitely be back!

name: chris rudd
text: Avg food average cost average service

text: Had the shitake pizza and vegan cheese. It was amazing! And everyone was super nice. 10/10

text: Good pizza and quaint atmosphere

name: Sheri S
text: Amazing place! Enough said

name: Jake Turner
text: I enjoyed it

name: Sean Donlon
text: I love Mellow Mushroom. They have the BEST pizza and the sangria is so yummy. The pretzels are the best I've had. My only complaint is their overuse of non-reusable plastic products, otherwise, they would have five stars.

text: I never expect perfection at Mellow. And those expectations were met today

text: My girlfriend is dairy free and we just learned they have vegan cheese and somehow it tasted better than my regular cal zone!

name: Jim O'Cain
text: A little slow but we had a nice place for our kids birthday. The accommodated us right as we walked in, with no advance planning. Food was great!

name: Jesse Fox
text: Dog friendly. Great service. Atmosphere was inviting

name: Joseph Smith
text: First time here. Good pizza. We had a pretty big group and the server Mykayla took good care of us.

name: Todd Sullivan
text: Tasty food, great prices. Never been before, but I tried a calzone. It was huge and fantastic!

name: Tyler Peacock

name: Mikell Williams
text: Great Food. Friendly Staff.

name: Ray e
text: Its pretty much what everybody has said .the pizza and wings are great, service hit and miss. But the place is dirty, tables & menus sticky  , floors dirty ,our plates were dirty so we ate on napkins .

name: Nancy Day
text: It's good but it's just wasn't my cup of tea first sports bar it's okay

name: Krista Hussey

name: heather lopez
text: Good food. Always freezing. Bring a jacket.

name: Greggory Harrington
text: Nikki was my waitress and she was nothing short of amazing! It was like she was always one step ahead of us! Great restaurant with plenty of vegan options!

text: Some of the best pizza anywhere. It's a little slow to get but a pleasant, clean restaurant.

name: Mrs. Damon James Hendley

text: Good pizza and service. You only get a small container er of cheese dip for $2.49 extra with pretzels and charged 25 cents for extra dressing in a tiny container for a decent size salad.

name: Now you know
text: Taylor was my waitress and I love her! She was well educated on all the food and drinks, made sure we had everything we needed, and answered any questions. I also really like that once I ordered a drink, she automatically said ‚Äúokay one ‚Ä¶More

name: Glenn Lewis
text: 1st time , really enjoyed it.

name: Pete Quist
text: I always love mellow mushroom but today it was unbelievably slow.  Staff standing around and not asking about drinks.  Not sure if this is an anomaly but it's not good. Ok, dropping yet another star.  They appoligised and gave us $2 off our bill.  Hey, don't bother.  Not good.

name: Sharon Hilbert
text: Good food but the prices are a little high.

name: Donna Herbert
text:
This place is awful. We waited for over45 min for a pizza. When we finally got it, it was wrong and burned. Will never be going back there
Seriously the worst pizza I have ever eaten! Giving this a one star only cause a no star is not an option.

name: Kristi Lynn Vena
text: Love the food, the many options of beer, the outside patio and we can bring the dogs (outside).

name: Kathaleen Baron
text: We have two dogs. Sometimes it is difficult to find a place that you can eat at and bring your family and fur babies. Mellow  Mushroom is the perfect place to go.

name: Tom Rodgers
text: I have eaten pizza in a LOT of places ...  In my opinion, Mellow Mushroom is THE BEST!

name: Bridgetdau Scott
text: I waited a hour for my pizza. And the bottom was real dark

name: Sally DeWitt
text: Fun place to eat. Sometimes the service is a little slow but the food is good. Their salads are yummy and the pizza crust is thick. You really can't go wrong with any option.

name: CJ Russo
text: Always terrible...always slow...always a let down. I‚Äôve been here five times in five years...note to self..don‚Äôt give it another shot.

name: Nick Rachels
text: Hosted a networking even before business hours grateful for their service to local business owners.

name: Robert Harding
text: I went in for happy hour for a beer and pretzels. Except for three people at the bar and a couple of diners, the restaurant was empty. However, 35 minutes after ordering my pretzels I still didn't have them. When I informed them that I had ‚Ä¶More

name: Angee Siegel
text: We used to really love this restaurant. But as of late the service is just not there. Difficult to get refills, and out or bill took forever. I saw another waitress and I wanted to be moved but I didn't ask. It's difficult to request better ‚Ä¶More

text: Best pizza place ever

name: Keegan Phillips
text: Really good food but watries  took to long to come

name: Steve Brown
text: Best pizza and coolest place in town!

name: Sabrinna Maples Brown
text: Pizza is always good every mellow I feel like. But the service was slow (there was four people in the place) and they messed up my order (I'm allergic to dairy and they used regular cheese) and it was beyond freezing, my fiance and I literally were numb by the time we left. The artwork is really cool there though.

name: Christi Whitehead
text: The Meatball Hoggie was AMAZING! So worth the trip to Georgia! Family outings are the best!

name: Carrie Powers
text: Don't do it! I read Yelp reviews and ignored them. I thought, surely it can't be that bad. I've been to the one in Denver a bunch of times and it's always been great. This time though - not so much. Our appetizer came out AFTER our pizzas ‚Ä¶More

text: Great atmosphere and good pizza!

name: Todd Cooke
text: Mello is always fun pizza's to die 4

text: Aweful pizza!

name: Lizzy Lovelace
text: Great, as always, and the staff was super patient with my 7 month old!

name: Tricia Williams
text: Delicious food! Lindsay is amazing amd VERY hospitable!

name: Mark Mackenzie
text: Food was good but service was very slow. Don't bother ordering dessert unless you plan on sitting at extra 35 min. waiting for a brownie.

name: Ashley Thompson

name: Chris Burke
text: Mellow Mushroom has it's own flavor no doubt, one you either love or hate. The atmosphere is fun enough for college kids but in a college town you end up with college age kids serving you, which sometimes makes me cringe. ‚Ä¶More

name: loving life
text: Good service and great food!

name: Phil Weatherly
text:
Always nice to find somewhere with good beer in a relatively small town. This was a good spot for some.
Pizza was predictably tasty for Mellow. Don't do like us and get a large for 2 people. A medium is plenty.

name: Jim S.
text: The wait support staff were terrible, the place could use a good cleaning

name: Tim Fry
text: Great food and people

text: The food was very good.   Seevice was a bitslow

name: Ben W
text: Great pizza as expected from the Mellow. Recently tried one of their sandwich options and enjoyed it as well. The booth seats are hard wood with vertical backs so don't expect to sit and relax for very long. The food makes up for it though.

text: Food was ok but bar setup was nice. Did not enjoy the adult beverages and atmosphere was great.

name: Henry Williams
text: The best pizza Valdosta has to offer.

name: William Cobb

text: Haven't tried much of there menu but so far the pizzas and calzones are awesome. Servers can be hit or miss here but more often than not the trips here are enjoyed.

name: Lance Bennett

name: lynch hatfield

name: Kenyon Farmer

text: We are passing through, headed back to KC from Port Canaveral, and wanted something yummy to eat and boy did we find it!!! Mellow Mushroom is delicious!!! We got the pacific rim pizza, meatball hoagie,  and the spinach salad and It was all phenomenal! Will definitely eat here again if we get the chance!

name: Jasi Smith
text: Pizza is so good. Always had good service.

text: Great food and atmosphere. The price reflects this though. Not much else to say, but I'll definitely be back.

name: Tina Ann D
text: Good and service was wonderful

name: Russell Hassenstab
text: Best place to get a good pizza and beer. Friendly staff and a cool place to bring family and friends.

name: Jeremiah Kinser
text: This Mellow Mushroom was everything but Mellow. The superheroes tell the story of this place. Even if you aren't a fan of comics, this place will satisfy your taste. I highly recommend the Dragon's Milk. It comes in a killer little goblet mug.

name: Jimmy R
text: Always great food, if there is a wait, it is well worth it. Great selection of draft beers. Great service.

name: Nathaniel Dwyer
text: This was my third time, and it continues to impress me. The service and the food were great. We had Buffalo Chicken Pizza, washed down with plenty of sweet tea.

name: Matt Elsberry
text: Prices are way too high for the quality of food (or lack thereof). Our waitress tried too hard to be friendly and came across as awkward and annoying. The Mellow Mushroom is simply not what it used to be.  I highly doubt I will return.

name: Kailyn Shaffer
text: Great food and best bartending around town!! I come every Friday to start my weekend off! BF and I come at least twice a week before friday for their happy hour apps and drinks! You will not regret coming here!
